snippet: Six major stores, including Walmart and Costco, joined in the deal with New York’s attorney general. But there was one holdout, Amazon.
abstract: Six major retailers, including Walmart and Costco, agree to display prices by unit of measurement, as well as by item, on their websites and mobile apps; deal is brokered by New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman.
lead_paragraph: Six major stores, including Walmart and Costco, joined in the deal with New York’s attorney general. But there was one holdout, Amazon.

headline.seo: Walmart and Costco Join in Pricing Deal; Amazon Is Holdout
headline.main: Big Retailers Agree to List Unit Prices on Websites
headline.print_headline: Big Retailers Agree to List Unit Prices on Websites
